Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this API to approve or reject a prescription

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: logistics.error_pharmacistname_required
error_list.description: Pharmacist name is required. Please enter a valid name.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","required":"True","sample":"","key":"rspwPWw","type":"string","name":"order_sn"},{"description":"

Approve or reject the prescription. Available values: TRUE, FALSE.

","required":"True","sample":"","key":"KctkCSj","type":"boolean","name":"is_approved"},{"description":"

Reject reason code. Available values: 

1 = Invalid Prescription (counterfeit/incorrect format)

2 = Incorrect Dosage

3 = No Prescription

4 = Unclear Image

","required":"False","sample":"","key":"daptNwY","type":"int","name":"reject_reason_code"},{"description":"

The list of invalid items that make the prescription get rejected

","required":"False","sample":"","key":"Pbrnfhn","type":"object[]","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","required":"True","sample":"","key":"xinzfHG","type":"int","name":"item_id"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a model of an item.

","required":"True","sample":"","key":"ZAbmpzk","type":"int","name":"model_id"},{"description":"

The identify of product promotion. For items in one same add on deal promotion, the group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal promotion, the group_id should be 0. And the data is from group_id of shopee.orders.GetOrderDetails.

","required":"True","sample":"","key":"WsQMwfW","type":"int","name":"group_id"}],"name":"items"},{"description":"

Full name of the pharmacist. Required for PH and ID Prescription Orders.

","name":"pharmacist_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"axEMJFX"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

This is to indicate whether the request has been executed successfully.

","name":"is_success","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"jNeSnWX"}]},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"31e9243595ff6f0ddd375106e8d18920","type":"string","required":null,"key":"TAZiDQA"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":" ","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fcWFQDh"},{"description":"

","name":"error","sample":" ","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CHTzmPW"}]}
